attributes.additional_details:
The Laws On 'Cannabis' need relaxed and at least De-Criminalised for the sake of those who would benefit from its medicinal values and also its abillity to also break social barriers with other people.
But This needs done in an Organised way cheaper to those with a prescription ect...
many people in this country have been 'made' criminals in this country for doing somthing so natural to mankind since before the Society we know today existed yet they are sat in cells in our own country right now as you read this petition...
Now is the time to do somthing about it... before more cancer and ms patients suffer...
not sacking the scientist who labour payed to do the research when he gave them the results and his advice like out labour government did...
Freedom of speach should prevail and david nutt should be given his job back
